attributes.action: Award a knighthood to Gary Lineker for services to humanitarian aid awareness.
attributes.background: On 18/10/2016, Gary Lineker raised concerns over the treatment and welfare of young migrants coming to the U.K. from war-torn Syria. His simple statement, viewed by millions, has resulted in frank discussions about how we, as a nation, should treat desperate refugees with compassion and empathy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
